website_summaries.verdict: If you want a very inexpensive way to try out a Christmas light projector for your home, this is a decent choice.
cons: Sometimes the lights do not seem really crisp
The projection area is a little small

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is awesome. Works great, Super easy and vibrant color on my home!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Delightful Show!
customer_reviews.text: This light show is delightful! It projects beautiful colorful patterns all over my neighborhood and is guaranteed to make everyone who walks through them or drives through them smile! I do not want to use it just for Christmas and Halloween, but for every event where some extra joy is needed, especially New Year's, Easter, birthdays, weddings, graduations, and Thanksgiving!
customer_reviews.author: Katrelya A. Angus

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: I had one I found at the store and was needing more, I just got two more in the mail today.... I love them, use them during christmas on my house, and then all summer long for pool parties and then in fall for all the bonfires, a great buy for me,. shipping was fast,,big thumbs up .....
customer_reviews.author: Sissy

customer_reviews.title: Setup couldn't be easier
customer_reviews.text: This works well for creating a light show on the side of our white motorhome. I knocked off one star because my husband wanted a static mode where the lights wouldn't move, but for what it is and the price, it works very well, and set up couldn't be easier. Just stick it in the ground, aim it, plug it in, and go!
customer_reviews.author: E. Smith

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not impress with this. The lights are not clear, looks fuzzy more light water drops. Way over priced.
customer_reviews.author: jtforth

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, colorful!
customer_reviews.text: I turn this on every single night! It acts as a colorful outside light projecting beautiful colors on the front of the house. My neighbors love it too!
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL....
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS...It's in my livingroom and I put it on at night and when I workout in the morning. It's so BEAUTIFUL on the walls. colorful lights dancing all around. It's so so WORTH the $$$$ and the PRICE was great...
customer_reviews.author: Nailgoddess

customer_reviews.title: Easiest way to put up christmas lights, call me ...
customer_reviews.text: Easiest way to put up christmas lights, call me lazy but I think 5 of these in the yard make up for the traditional lights, and it takes wayyyy less time.
customer_reviews.author: W

customer_reviews.title: This looks great on your house dont have to worry with puting ...
customer_reviews.text: This looks great on your house dont have to worry with puting up all those decoration. Love it got on time for Christmas will buy from this seller again
customer_reviews.author: sharon harris

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Works very awesome colors all the front facade of our house.
customer_reviews.author: Spot not Sport

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this product after local store was sold out. Gives a more full light experience than the laser type I also have. Works well to bring color to my otherwise blank garage door. I use one on each side of the driveway for the two car garage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice lights!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely light show! We bought two of these for the front of our house and were one of only two in the neighborhood with moving lights being displayed. A few bush lights and we were done with the outdoor decorations.
customer_reviews.author: Mystii

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty colors! Doesn't project as clear as I thought it would. But all in all a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn B.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little too flashy for me. I wish I had gotten a more traditional Christmas lighting set.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, so nail them down or they'll disappear
customer_reviews.text: Really cool. Unfortunately, somebody stole the first night. Recommend attaching them to house, not sticking them in the ground in your yard.
customer_reviews.author: R. Blair

customer_reviews.title: Dead in 5 minutes
customer_reviews.text: The product last all of 5 minutes. The lights went out and the disk kept spinning. These lights are very spotty. Not my first issue with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: LLov

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looked great at the campground when we decorated for Halloween!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Overschmidt

customer_reviews.title: Were fine until they stopped working.....
customer_reviews.text: While these worked we loved them, but right after Christmas they stopped. The inner circle thing still moved but there were no lights. Amazon was as always great and gracious and allowed us to return them for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: CC Mom of 6

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job.
customer_reviews.text: I use to put lights on the house. This is a piece of cake. Does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great- use in low light areas!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Works great, nice color selection, I like how it moves. Cons: Need to have a very low-no light area. The street light that's on the other side of the house really weakens what this thing can do.
customer_reviews.author: Asa Clapp

customer_reviews.title: Dazzeling
customer_reviews.text: This is so much fun, indoors or out. Also the perfect sleepover kids fun.
customer_reviews.author: june

customer_reviews.title: Rather dull compared to my neighbors
customer_reviews.text: Not a bright as I expected. Rather dull compared to my neighbors.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looked great over the holidays.....even better with the light colors dancing on the snow...yes I will/would buy again
customer_reviews.author: sybil smith

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the holidays
customer_reviews.text: This is an easy way to brighten up your holidays...good,bright easy to set-up product
customer_reviews.author: Joe Propersi

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty. Good change from only having red and green colors like other ones.
customer_reviews.author: J&TBL

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Not what i expected. Works good inside a room if you want a disco ball. Out side you need a strong flashlight to find it.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Ford

customer_reviews.title: Really enjoyed seeing it in our patio
customer_reviews.text: We were so excited to see & use this light!! Really enjoyed seeing it in our patio,thanks
customer_reviews.author: Marie Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Multicolor Kaleidoscope Lightshow
customer_reviews.text: It was not was I was expecting but I liked the reflection and is great for parties.
customer_reviews.author: TooTall

customer_reviews.title: I returned it. After 10 minutes the light died ...
customer_reviews.text: I returned it. After 10 minutes the light died and only the fan worked. Return and credit were handled in a speedy manor.
customer_reviews.author: MTBoyll

customer_reviews.title: Not Bright
customer_reviews.text: Not that bright for outside lighting. Cost was way too high compared to Lowes.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I will be ordering more. It did what I needed it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It does work but the light colors are not as bright as expected
customer_reviews.author: jjs

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lights aren't as bright as I had hoped. We even had two projecting on the house.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy B.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: does not project as well as we had hoped or as it was advertised
customer_reviews.author: Rev Leanna Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't cover as large of an area that I had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: NOT happy with it at all
customer_reviews.text: NOT happy with it at all. Only covers a small section of my house if I want the lights to be bright because I have to move it so close to the house. If I want it to cover a larger section and move it away from the house, the lights are dim and fuzzy. I was really hoping for bright, clear lights swirling on my house. That is not what I got! Don't buy this!! I'll be looking for a different light to decorate the rest of my house!
customer_reviews.author: Rearete

customer_reviews.title: Just like discription.
customer_reviews.text: I love this item. It's different then what I see around town, colors and gorgeous and it really looks like I'm looking through a kaleidoscope.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Greene

product_meta.title: Gemmy Lightshow Multicolor Kaleidoscope Projection Red, Green and Blue Holiday Light for Halloween & Christmas (Bulk Packaging)
product_meta.description: Turn the front of your home into a dazzling display of Christmas cheer with the multicolor kaleidoscope lightshow projection Christmas decoration. This simple accessory includes 3 RGB energy-efficient LED bulbs in a kaleidoscope globe that project a spectacular lightshow against the front of your home. This fun decoration is made for outdoor use only and is ETL listed for your safety. Installation of the multicolor Christmas lightshow projection is quick and easy, so you can enjoy the show in no time. Its durable plastic design resists corrosion in winter's elements, and allows for convenient setup and removal. The bright bulbs will last season after season, so you and your neighbors can enjoy a fun display of festive holiday color.
feature_bullets: The multicolor kaleidoscope lightshow projection Christmas decoration features 3 RGB LED energy-efficient bulbs that are made to last over many seasons...
includes 3 RGB energy-efficient LED bulbs in a kaleidoscope globe that project a spectacular lightshow against the front of your home.
Features turning, swirling blue, green and red lights..,
made for outdoor use only and is ETL listed for your safety.
great for Christmas, Halloween, Parties, Weddings, Prom. use on your house, Trees, Garage door or shrubbery and much more!
